Bibliographic References: PP, p. 35, note 46; LCS, p. 206, no. 44; LIMC III, p. 922, Eros 858, pi. 658, 3
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysiac procession moving to left—papposilen with small Eros, playing the flute, on his shoulders in 'flying angel' pose, Dionysos, with branch in right, holding up bell in left, maenad with tambourine in left, (b) nude youth, holding up wreath in right, between halfNon Sepcifieddraped youth with stick, and draped youth with wreath and stick with hanging wreath
